text: @Mike_Pence @SecAzar @WhiteHouse People in every state know this statement isn't true.if there is a coronavirus task force the President is undermining every decision.Testing isn't widespread, results take too long. Testing is for  those with symptoms onky. False reassurances are dangerous and unnecessary.
